title: Jericoacoara, Brazil
desc: Jericoacoara is a small finishing village and mecca for kitesurfing and windsurfing.
climate: Jericoacoara has tropical climate with rainy season in Jan-Jul and dry season in Jul-Dec
crowds: Additionally: avoid National holiday period between Dec-Feb with local tourists flocking to beach destinations.

others.title: Cumbuco, Brazil
others.desc: Cumbuco is a relaxed beach village popular with kite and windsurfers

others.title: Lencois Maranhenses National Park, Brazil
others.desc: Sand Dunes in the park are a national wonder not to miss, especially after rainy season when water from the rain forms surreal lagoons between the dunes

others.title: Fortaleza, Brazil
others.desc: Fortal - off season carnival is taking place in the last week of July
